desc: Taste Over Style - This really sums up our brewing philosophy. We never shoot for a specific style, instead we let taste act as our compass. We take our inspiration from the culinary world, traditional beer styles, natural ingredients, vineyards and even junk food, but wherever that journey takes us- taste is our guide

layout.text:
Join us on 8.13 at Oak Canyon Park as we celebrate 14 years of exploration, innovation, and making life a little more interesting.
- Unlimited Pours
- 20+ event exclusive beers from The Bruery
- 75+ craft beer, mead, cider, and wine producers
It's shaping up to be a party you won't forget!
